resources.string: Are you sure? you want to remove photo.
Sorry you have not selected any photo from gallery
Sorry you have not taken any photo from Camera
You have removed photo, Please select photo again from camera or gallery
Permission Denied to use external storage
Something went wrong finding Settings activity. \nGo to \'Settings\' and grant permission manually.
Without write permission you will not be able to share the image. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
You have denied permission to write in external storage, without this permission you will not be able to share image. Please enable it in settings
Permission Denied to read external storage
Without write permission you will not be able to take photo from camera. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
Without camera permission you will not be able to click photo. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
You have denied permission to write in external storage, without this permission you will not be able to take phtot. Please enable it in settings
Without read permission you will not be able to view the image from gallery. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
You have denied permission to read in external storage, without this permission you will not be able to view image from gallery. Please enable it in settings
You have denied permission to use camera, without this permission you will not be able to click photo. Please enable it in settings
